Product Specifications \n
Star Wars Rebel Alliance Special Forces Rucksack \n
Officially-licensed Star Wars merchandise \n
Also shows the Rebel Alliance symbol \n
If you put an Ewok in the bag, don’t roll the top down too tight \n
Adjustable shoulder straps \n
Materials: Polyester, faux leather (vegan), and silicone strap closure \n
Dimensions: 18″ tall x 12″ wide x 5″ deep \n
Care Instructions: Wipe clean with a damp cloth \n
Weight: 2 lb.
